Class KSPrivateKeyEntry

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DSSPrivateKeyEntry

    public class KSPrivateKeyEntry
extends Object
implements DSSPrivateKeyEntry
    Wrapper of a PrivateKeyEntry coming from a KeyStore.
